mapper.select: select p.id, p.host_id, p.name, p.port, p.protocol, p.server_port, p.outer_port from cloud_host_open_port p where host_id = #{hostId} order by name, port
mapper.insert: insert into cloud_host_open_port ( id, host_id, name, protocol, port, server_port, outer_port) values (#{id}, #{hostId}, #{name}, #{protocol}, #{port}, #{serverPort}, #{outerPort})
